tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MonthlyStatements (
    statement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    statement_date DATE,
    starting_balance DECIMAL,
    ending_balance DECIMAL,
    items ARRAY<STRING>
)

CREATE TABLE transaction ( 
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    statement_id INT, 
    transaction_date DATE, 
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50), 
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) 
);

CREATE TABLE account_activity ( 
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    customer_id INT, 
    activity_date DATE, 
    description TEXT, 
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2) 
);

CREATE TABLE financial_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    report_type VARCHAR(50),
    report_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE account_activities (
    activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    activity_date DATE,
    activity_description TEXT,
    activity_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
CREATE TABLE Customer (customer_id INT, first_name VARCHAR(255), last_name VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), address VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (customer_id));
CREATE TABLE Account (account_id INT, customer_id INT, account_type VARCHAR(50), balance DECIMAL(10,2), FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer (customer_id), PRIMARY KEY (account_id));

CREATE TABLE Transaction (transaction_id INT, account_id INT, transaction_date DATE, amount DECIMAL(10,2), description TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (account_id) REFERENCES Account (account_id), PRIMARY KEY (transaction_id));

CREATE TABLE Statement (statement_id INT, customer_id INT, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, total_amount DECIMAL(10,2), FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer (customer_id), PRIMARY KEY (statement_id));
CREATE TABLE Report (report_id INT, customer_id INT, report_date DATE, report_type VARCHAR(50), content TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES Customer (customer_id), PRIMARY KEY (report_id));
